td.span: The international ISPRS GeoSpatial Conference 2022 is organized by the School of Surveying and GeoSpatial Engineering, College of Engineering, University of Tehran, and will be held from 19-23 February 2023 at the 2nd campus of Engineering school of University of Tehran, Iran.
